‘The List’: This was the secret roadmap people followed to get safe abortions before Roe

Before Roe v. Wade held that the Constitution protects the right to choose abortion, the procedure was banned or heavily restricted in most states, including California. Typically, according to the legal system, a person seeking an abortion was a person plotting a crime.

There’s a simple way to cut your water use — but many don’t even know about it

As the latest California drought drags on, advocates are pointing to reused household water, known as greywater, as a relatively easy solution for people trying to cut outdoor water use. But they note that statewide incentives are still lacking for installing systems that can save a household thousands of gallons a year.
